"Well.. its official.. your fat.. 350lbs of pure lazy lard.. guess those cookies did their work.. although not as well as they were supposed to.." Luke said with a laugh, although there hidden behind the humor in his eyes gleamed a potent attraction. Matt stepped down from the scale and tried to sidle his way past Luke to the bathroom mirror. Tried being the key word he thought, as Luke careened to the ground, forced there by the sheer bulk of Matt's new obese body. It seemed that for the next few days he would be doomed to repeat the obnoxious fumblings of a teenager going through a growth spurt. At least until he got used to his new proportions.

"Ops.. sorry.." Matt said nervously as he bent down to help Luke up, acutely aware that even bending was harder now.

"It's ok big guy.. these things happen when you grow.." Luke said with a smile as he grabbed Matt's hands and allowed himself to be raised to his feet. Even as he did that Matt couldn't help but again admire the quiver of Luke's own flabby abdomen. He had beautifully fattened curves to go with those spectacular moobs.

"How did this happen?" Matt asked blankly, looking at himself in the mirror. "I mean.. why did I let myself get so fat..?" Matt said as he grabbed several handfuls of soft fat from his belly and gave it a shake sending ripples throughout his whole body. It was a strange sensation, to feel the tremors of fat ripple through his body as he did this.

"Were the fat counsellors this year, remember?" Luke said with a smile, "We've got a lot of fattening up to do before the campers arrive! Last year the fat counsellors were at least 450lbs, but the director says that we should probably be bigger than that this year..."

"What?!? That's huge!" Matt yelled with surprise, "There's no way I'm gonna get that big.. I mean look at me already!"

"Yeah... look at you... " Luke whispered quietly, "Your fucken huge Matt...and after only a couple days here.. your going to be the biggest counsellor we've ever had.."

Matt could see the lust in Luke's eyes. His eyes tracked all over Matt's body, drinking in every new soft bulge that had formed over his once muscular body. He seemed to revel in every sinful gluttonous detail of this whole experience, and Matt was beginning to worry that in the haze of his own desire, Luke was really starting to rub off on him. Matt was really starting to enjoy feeling this fat and sexy.

"Were going to make you soo huge Matt" Luke says as he came up behind him attempting to wrap his arms around Matt's obese form. "It's going to be amazing..."

Then what happens?

The mess hall was large and smelled like buttery cinnamon buns. Matt heard plates being moved around in the back kitchen, with the smell of all sorts of exotic foods. "You wait here Matt...I'll tell Tim we've arrived," said Luke softly. Matt wondered if Luke had something big planned for him here in the mess hall.
After a while, Luke came out with a big plate of assorted foods: Brownies, cookies, muffins, sticky buns, bagels, crispy chicken, corn, french fries, and chocolate pudding. "Eat up big fella, we need to get that tank filled up!"
Matt knew what Luke was doing; he wanted a bigger belly to mess around with...but was that such a bad thing? Matt had grown to love his big beer belly, in fact, couldn't keep his hands off it most of the time.

What was he to do?

"That's just so amazing I don't even know how to express it!" He threw his arms around Matt's massive frame, not even coming close to reaching all the way around, between Matt's girth and his own notable but far less substantial chub. Matt reached around himself, just barely making a grab at Luke's soft tush. "Why don't you show me?" he asked, his voice soft and deep. That night was fantastic, even better than the first one with Russ when Matt was just starting his gain. Luke loved every roll of fat on Matt's body, and wasn't shy about showing it. When they both finally fell asleep the faint twilight before the dawn just barely peeking through the cabin window.

choices: "From now on we eat the same, pound for pound."

115211122121221212.content:
"Excuse me?" Luke asked incredulously, staring at Matt.

"You heard me. I said I was thinking you still have a long way to go if you want to meet the minimum requirement for this year's 'Fat Counselors.'" Matt answered, his face totally serious. "I mean, here I am, more than quadruple my original size, all in more or less forty-eight hours. Meanwhile you haven't gained an ounce since I first met you, and I doubt you weigh even a third of what I do now. That just won't do."

"I don't know..." Luke hesitated. It was clear that despite his engorged state when they'd met, Luke was far more interested in fattening up his partner than he was in fattening up himself. "Maybe you could just make up the weight for me?" he asked hopefully.

"Come on my little friend," Matt chided. "I'm not asking for so much. All I want is for this," he reached out and grabbed a chunk of Luke's fleshy middle, giving it a small shake and watching it jiggle, "to start looking more like this." With his other hand Matt grabbed his own belly and shook. The difference was substantial, the rolling waves of Matt's flesh clearly outmatching Luke's quivering jiggle.

Luke sighed, knowing he was beat. "Fine then, have it your way," he grumbled, pulling himself up off his fleshy bed. "I'll need an incentive however, something to make me want to gain."

Matt thought for a moment. This was where negotiations could get tricky. Might as well start big. "How about a complete halt on my gaining then?" he asked, struggling to get up himself. "I'll refuse to put on a single pound more until you've at least doubled in size."

Luke laughed, scoffing at Matt's first offer. "Nice try Matt, but we both saw how you ate yesterday. There's no way you could handle restricting yourself to just the bare minimum." He reached out and offered a hand to help Matt up.

Luke had him there. Matt was already hungry, and even the thought of not eating just made him hungrier still. He supposed he could easily eat double what Luke could even when stuffing himself. All right then, how about...?"

What deal should they make to help Luke gain weight?

The sun rose and its rays peeked into the boy's cabin. Luke awoke first. He stepped on the scale to see that he did indeed weigh the 550 pounds that was part of the deal. He played with the new fat around his midsection. Unlike Matt, Luke didn't enjoy having all this fat on him.

Matt tried to sit up in bed, but the size of his midsection made it impossible.

"Hey Luke. I see you're looking a little round", Matt said in his new deep baritone voice.

All the fat needed some place to go, and because some of the fat went to his back, Matt towered over Luke in terms of height as well as girth.

Luke screamed "I love this. I love you and I love your fat!" He then gave his "friend" a hug around the midsection, although his arms didn't even make it halfway across.

Ignoring Luke's hugs and screams, Matt looked at himself in the mirror. 1300 pounds of man was something he had never seen before. His gut stuck out at least a foot in front of him; his arms and legs were mostly flab and his thighs were nearly on top of each other. With his very thick hand, Matt slapped his belly. Russ stood up, and his enormous belly plummeted out in front of him in slow-motion. The lights in the cabin seemed to dim in its presence, and Matt felt dwarfed in its shadow.

Matt's brain was racing, but his lips merely hung open and stammered as he tried answering Russ's provocative question; his twitchy body language spoke volumes, his eyes glued to Russ' quivering navel.

"I guess you aren't used to seeing guys as big as me", Russ smirked knowingly. He walked past Matt and let the subject drop, to spare Matt some embarrassment and break the spell over him. His fleshy sides trembled with each step, only intensifying Matt's stare, which kept fixed on the mountain of fat.

"Sorry, I didn't mean to stare." Matt responds. His throat ached from the lump that was caught in it, but did his best to keep the nervousness of his voice.

"Your turn." Russ said, relinquishing the bathroom. Matt nabbed his suit and ducked inside to change. When he awkwardly stepped back out, Russ was reclined on a nearby bunk, his arms and head overshadowed by his mammoth belly and legs, which stretched out before him. Matt followed suit and sat on the opposite bunk in his swim trunk, staring across the floor with unease at Russ.

"Ready to go?" Russ asked.

"Yeah, if you are." Matt replied.

"If you're just getting settled in, we could just hang instead." Russ grunted and stood up; the bunk creaked, his fleshy gut rolled down over his legs, and the underside shook and loomed in front of Matt's face.

Matt smacked his greasy lips and his stomach growled for more. Matt knew better than to put off packing, but for some reason he had to meet the guy behind that sauce-dripping turkey.

Russ slowly got to his feet and stood up off the bench--his quivering potbelly slumped over his shorts in a flabby mound, and as it shook Matt glanced at it and watched Russ's his shirt to ride up and the bottom of his gut. He followed Russ into a kitchen where Tim the chef was busy washing some of the messiest, food-covered pots and pans Matt had ever seen. The whole place looked like it could make enough food for ten banquets at once, yet it was built into a tiny out-of-the-way camp. Curious, Matt thought. Tim dried himself off and shook his hand.

"Hi, nice to meet you," he said as they exchanged pleasantries. "Did you two like the turkey?"

"It was really good." Russ exclaimed. Matt was a little more interested in the sauce that was poured over it, since it was almost better than the chicken itself. "That sauce..." he asked, "I've never tasted anything like before. What's in it."

"Secret family recipe." Tim said (rather unconvincingly). "Listen, if you like it so much, you're both welcome to some of the leftovers from lunch. I was going to throw it out anyway."

Matt glanced at Russ, who seemed ready to dig in for more. But for some reason Matt felt wary. "Is there a lot??..." he asked. "Not that much. I mean, compared to dinner anyway. Really, two young, growing guys like you will finish it off in two seconds."

Matt nodded, though really he'd only skimmed them - this was only for the summer, after all! Matt scurried up a hill and saw a small restaurant just down the way. He certainly thought it was odd. The nearest highway had to at least be 20 miles away and this sure wasn't a residential area. Sure enough, though, there were cars in the parking lot and it didn't appear derelict. Matt thought of turning back but the sky had rumbled tremendously and the rain fell down much harder.

Approaching the building, he noted it's rustic, cabin design and saw a sign reading "Jack's Flapjacks!" Even before he opened the door, he was overwhelmed by the sweet scent of maple syrup and cooking batter. Matt's mouth started to water, but he tried his best to ignore it. After all, this didn't look like a place that knew what portion control meant. He went inside with a soft jingle from a bell hanging by the door.

The interior didn't disappoint. The walls were covered with some typical home country goods and pictures. The tables and booths were all made of maple wood that had been roughed up over the years. The never-ending sweat was infusing with the cool breeze to lower my core temperature which unfortunately firmed up my glistening belly and substantially reduced the size of my moobs.

“You’re highly attractive sacks of fatty tissue in your abdomen, legs and arms. They usually like a lot under the chin and around the neck, but you’ll do just fine” Robert winked twice, where one wink would have been enough.

I was wondering if I should be worried or afraid of whom Robert was referring to. He seemed to dodge the question. Second time’s the charm, eh? I’ll ask again.

“So, Robert. Who was it that was interested in my provocative gifts?” I said. Pretending as if I had long hair, I flicked my neck to purposefully cause my moobs and gut to sway like a plastic grocery bag filled with cottage cheese.

“Oh, you’ll find out shortly” Robert said, as he helped me off the floor. I wondered why he was unwilling to assist my horribly flaccid and immobile body previously, standing with his crotch about 5 inches from my face for the last few minutes.

152132.content:
.... a unicorn that appeared to be worthy of space travel. It had a faint glow to it, and it stood proud. A majestic steed with a grand horn, that had a sparkle to it in the sun light.

"Holy... a unicorn? I didn't even think these things existed!" I said in awe, my jaw opened a little bit. Or at least it felt like it was, until I realized it was my fourth chin.
"Hmm hmm hmmmmm yes, this is in fact a unicorn Johnny. It will take you were you want to go. Now do not waste anymore time, hop on and be off!" Robert said, as he took a sip of his alcoholic beverage.

I walked over to the unicorn, and to my surprise he spoke, "Hello Mathew."
"You can talk?!" I said, a little shocked that not only is there a unicorn in front of me, but he can also speak.
"Of course I can talk Mathew. We shouldn't waste anymore time here, you are bound for much greater things. Hop on and let us go forth!" he said, rearing up on two feet as if to show his excitement for the events that would unfold.
"I would love to, but I am a very large man. My manly body may be too much for your back." I said, looking down at the grown and kicking up some dirt.
"Fear not Mathew, weight does not exist in space."

I looked up at the unicorn, wiping the tear from my eye and smiling. I grabbed hold of the unicorn's back to attempt to climb on. I struggled for the first 5 minutes as I was not used to climbing things. The massive amounts of sweat that was pouring out of my fat body didn't help my cause. After 15 more minutes I finally managed to get on the unicorn, and immediately collapsing on it's back, winded from the journey to get up there.

I woke up to find myself surrounded by darkness. I noticed the stars all around me. I tried moving my neck passed my known limits to check to the side of me. To my surprise I saw the planet Earth. It wasn't a dream after all, the unicorn had really taken me to space. What wonders would await me out in this vast universe? The best part is that out here I don't weigh a thing! Goodbye limitations of our planet, I was set to start gaining even more weight!

"Ah, Mathew. You have awakened from your fat induced slumber. I have a surprise for you." the unicorn said, turning it's head to the side to see me.
"What is it?" I said, puzzled as to what it could be.

The unicorn looked ahead again, as if to tell me to look with him. I looked into the distance, and to my surprise there was a....
152132.title: a unicorn worthy of spacetravel.

Door #2: Dairy Queen Milky-Way candy bar Blizzard ice-cream treat. I love those!
1521322.content:
... Ben & Jerry's ice-cream parlor. I couldn't believe my eyes. Not because it seemed to just float there with what looked like it's own atmosphere, but because I was famished and the rolls of my stomach were speaking to me as if I was their huntsman and they were my hungry villagers. I couldn't remember the last time I went this long without eating. Maybe it was the fact I was in an oxygen deprived vacuum.

I began to salivate vigorously causing the unicorn to neigh in discomfort.
"Sorry, sir" I stated, as I began wiping the saliva from the mane of the unicorn with my quivering belly. "It's alright. It's just unicorns are known for being clean and pretty, is all" said the unicorn as his galloping seemed to magically speed us up.

I was getting anxious and started squirming like the fat kid I was. I couldn't help myself. It was as if I was in the store rubbing ice cream all over my moobs already. And then it happened...

My squirming could no longer be contained by my love-handles which acted as a saddle for these many hours. "I cannot turn, for I have no wings! I AM NO PEGASUS. WHY CAN'T I BE A PEGASUS! WHY!?" the unicorn screamed as he began to cry and float away.

Fortunately, I still had momentum from my morbidly obese body flopping off of the unicorn into space. Fortunately, I was headed in the direction of what may be the only thing that could save my sanity. Ben & Jerry's, where I could gorge on as much ice-cream as my pre-pubescent heart could handle. I waved goodbye to the unicorn as he tipped his top hat to me like the gentleman he was. I knew I would see him again someday.

As I rolled, turned and fidgeted closer to the ice-cream parlor, I imagined the magnificent and alien space-ice-creams I would sample. I envisioned ice-creams made of glowing plasma and gaseous fumes rising from the cone of an alien ice-cream delicacy. And then. All of the sudden, I hit something. I thumped and rolled, like I do on a daily basis when I trip over my ankle fat. - It's pretty funny and I usually laugh at myself with others, because I'm like a turtle when it comes to getting up.

"Greeeeetings sirhowmay, I, helpyou" said this shadowy figure with an accent that resembled the sound my bowels make after adjusting to abundance of room within my abdomen after using the bathroom.
"Oh hello. My name is Matt. I was looking to sample your ice-creams." I said with a slight stutter due to the fact I was at my fat camp hours earlier having my fat massaged by attractive women.
"Ahyes, I also, likethenameMatt, I see. Yes, yes, yes, we do indeedhavethe icecream that you are interestedin" the still cloaked figured stated, "We also have, no. No you wouldn'tbeinterested in that."
"Interested in what?" I asked with as much of a joyful sound to my voice as I could considering I was struggling to even get to my knees.
"We have a special. Thinkofit as a gameshow, that youcanpick multiple winnings" he said rubbing his hand-less arms together.
"Well what can I win? Is there something bad?" I mustered as I was almost out of breath while coming to a standing position after this lengthy conversation.
"All I can say. All I can say is that youeatall, of, the winnings you win" as the shadowy figure pointed to a wall with two doors.

1522.content:
Matt rolled over, with a groan, and looked up the legs legs above the trainers.

"Mum, he's waking up!" Jessica said with relief. Matt continued to look up - the trainers must belong to Shelly, he realised - and saw that Shelly was probably twice his weight!

"Thank goodness you've not out cold!" said Shelly. "Are you OK? You fell hard."

"Sure, I'm OK," Matt said, pushing himself upright. Shelly was HUGE! He tried to keep his face straight. "Thanks for checking on me, ma'am."

"Well, it wasn't the best welcome we could provide," remarked Shelly. "Come with me, we'll get you settled in, something to eat. And it's not ma'am, but Shelly. You must be one of the new counsellors," she finished.

"Yes," said Matt, trying not to stumble again. Shelly and Jessica brought Matt down to the main dining hall, where they were greeted by...
1522.title: Shelly's probably twice his weight!

15223.content:
Matt follows behind Shelly, watching her fat thighs rub together as she wobbles towards the Main Dining Hall. Matt has always been attracted to larger women and Shelly was just his type. She was a very beautiful, and big, woman obviously weighing over 300 hundred pounds, most of it in her double stacked belly and wide thighs. Shelly has lovely tan skin giving her an almost caramel-like complexion, long wavy black hair tucked into a loose bun, and large lively green eyes. Despite Shelly's age(36), her face has shown no signs of age, sporting two fat checks with a very small chin on top of a second chin. To Matt, Shelly was a blubbery goddess.

Matt, Shelly, and Jessica enter the Main Dining Hall. Matt looks around the Main Dining in awe, surprised by the size of it. The Cafeteria/Main Dining Hall was the largest building at the campsite, with ceilings tall enough for an old tree to continue growing and long/deep enough to fit at least ten of the camper's cabins in. The dining hall and almost everything in it was made of wood, giving it an old cozy log house vide. The trio makes it halfway through the dining hall before they could hear a noise coming from the kitchen. Shelly lets out a sigh, knowing exactly what was making the noise and yells.

"MINDY, your bubble butt better not be eating all the food," Shelly calls out playfully.

A woman replies with the familiar sound of someone talking with their mouth full, "Um, no... Of course not".

"Well, when you get done, 'Not Eating' come out here and meet our newest concealer," said Shelly with a grin on her face.

Matt and Shelly watch the kitchen door, hearing heavy steps behind it. Out the kitchen, entering the dining hall came a large woman, much larger than Shelly, with bright shoulder length orange hair and a spot of chocolate on the side of her round face. The redhead had to be at least hundred pounds heavier than Shelly, with most of her weight in her smooth round belly and breasts that were bigger than Matt's head. As the Redhead wobbles her way to Shelly with a nervous smile on her face, Matt could see a candy bar, poorly hidden between her breasts as they bounced uncontrollably. Shelly and the redhead spread their arms embracing each other in a hug. Matt couldn't help but feel a 'warm' sensation watching two obese beauties bumping bellies.

Shelly leans back, with the redhead still in her arms and giggles, "Girlfriend, if you're going to lie, you have to get rid of evidence first". Shelly take her index finger and wipes off the chocolate off the confused redhead's face. Shelly shows her chocolate covered fingertip to the guilty redhead just before sticking it in her own mouth to eat it. The girls laughed.

"Anyways," Said Shelly trying to hold back her laughs. She put her left hand on Matt's shoulder, keeping the right on the redhead's shoulder, "Matt, I like ya to meet concealer Mindy, and Mindy, meet Matt".

"Nice to met you, Mindy," said Matt nervously holding out his right hand, prepared for a handshake.

"No need to be so formal were going to working together all summer long," replied Mindy giving Matt the softest hug he had ever received. Matt sank into Mindy's doughy body, deep enough to feel the candy bar she had hidden between her breasts. "It's nice to meet you too," finishing her sentence.

Matt steps back, red-faced looks Mindy up and down. Mindy was a young woman(24) around Matt's age(22) and height with big blue eyes surrounded by chubby round face. Mindy's lovely bright orange hair was very noticeable, but not as much as her bountiful bosoms pushed together and upward due to a bra that was slightly too small. Like her breast, Mindy's soft extended belly would jiggle with any movement she made. Matt thought Mindy was one the biggest cuties he had seen in real life. Mindy was definitely Matt's type and he prayed that that first hug wouldn't be his last.

"Well, now that's out of the way. How about we get something to eat," asked Shelly holding her top belly fat roll.

"YEAH! Ice Cream" squealed Jessica!

"Yeah, ice cream," Mindy says repeating Jessica.

"How about you Matt, want some ice cream," asking Shelly turning to Matt, growing impatient for the frozen treat.

"Nah, I'll just stick to a salad," answered Matt.

"Suit yourself," replied Shelly as all three girls wobble into the kitchen.

Matt enters the kitchen finding Mindy setting three large ceramic bowls, that seemed too big to not be a novelty, on a counter in the middle of the kitchen and Shelly carrying the biggest tub of vanilla ice cream he had ever seen. Shelly opens the tub as her daughter hands her an ice cream scoop the size of a garden trowel. As Matt gathers the fruits and veggies for his salad the girls were filling their bowls full of ice cream. Matt, hearing the sound of candy warper, turns around and sees Mindy pulling a candy bar out of her cleavage then breaking it apart into the ice cream. Shelly and Mindy moan in pleasure as they consumed their ice cream, distracting Matt as he chops veggies and giving him another 'warm' sensation. Matt finishes his salad and joins the girls, who have eaten more than halfway through their mountains of ice cream. Matt couldn't help but stare at the two ladies inhaling ice cream, wondering how none of them got brain freeze and how the small stools they're sitting on supported their weight. Watching Shelly and Mindy eat, it was more than obvious to see how these ladies grew to such girths.

Mindy was a slobby eater with bits of chocolate and ice cream around her mouth, eating faster than everyone. Mindy would lick the sides of her mouth between bites, while drops of melted ice cream rolled down her face and fall onto her breasts. At one point, Mindy pauses and lets out a small burp that Matt thought was hot. Mindy was a cute slob girl.

Shelly ate at sound barrier breaking speed, eating mouthfuls of ice cream at a time causing her cheeks to look bigger than usual. Shelly use a large spoon, the size of a small spatula, to shovel in her mouth. The way Shelly ate gave her a competitive eater's feel, eating large sums of food in small amounts of time. Matt admires a woman who knew how to eat. Shelly was a woman who could eat far more than she let on.

"That was refreshing," said Shelly with a pressured look on her face, rubbing her belly up and down with both hands.

"Yeah!" replies Jessica.

"OH GOD, I'm *burps* so STUFFED," said Mindy whose moans of satisfaction have turned to moans of discomfort.

"Well, that's what you get for pigging out beforehand," said Shelly somewhat disgusted with Mindy's burp. "Okay, the campers will be here soon and we have a meeting with Camp Chef Wanda and get our new uniforms, concealer June and Camp Cook Rosemary will be there too," continues Shelly as she wobbles her way around the counter.

"I don't think I can get up without some help," replies Mindy turning to Matt and winks.

"Hurry up, I don't want to be behind schedule," said Shelly as she and Jessica make their way out the kitchen.

Matt standing at the sink watches Shelly walk out the kitchen door, then turns to a stuffed Mindy whose resting her hands on top of her slightly extended belly just under her breasts, still sitting at the counter. Matt wonders, what he should he do next?
15223.title: The Other Concealer

choices: Thank Mindy for the offered candy.
152232.content:
Matt rolled his eyes and strode over to Mindy. Whether or not it was a trick, it would not do for any counsellor to be late for his or her duties. There was a saying about punctuality and its relation to godliness, but right now, as Matt lifted Mindy's massive, meaty arm onto his shoulders, the adage was unnecessary.

"Ready?" he asked, his knees bent.

"Fire away!" she grinned.

Bracing himself, Matt began hoisting Mindy back onto her feet, her nigh-spherical torso wobbling with each movement. He felt himself grit his teeth as he lifted her; clearly, this was harder than he anticipated.

Nevertheless, within a moment, Mindy stood steady on her feet, patting her enormous tummy.

"My hero!" she chuckled.

"My pleasure," Matt responded, "We don't want to keep them waiting." With that, he made for the door.

"But wait!" Mindy called as she followed, "At least let me reward my champion with a token of my favour." She smirked as she held up another candy bar from one of her pockets. Or her folds. "For you."

Matt glanced at the wrapper; it was not something he was familiar with. Certainly not one of the main brands he knew of. It had to be a foreign confection.
152232.title: Counsel and Support

1522321.content:
"Thank you!" Matt smiled as he accepted the sweet, breaking a piece off and popping it into his mouth. His eyebrows raised slightly; he did not anticipate the flavours - a charming marriage of dark chocolate, cinnamon and orange. It was most delicious. He rolled it around inside his mouth, chewing slowly and savouring the taste. He felt his head nod, as if in approval.

Mindy grinned, staring oddly intently.

"Thank you," Matt repeated at last as he swallowed, his lips curling up into a smile.

"You like it, huh?" Mindy gave a good-natured jab on the arm. "That's just one of the bars. I can show you more later, if you'd like."

"Thank you!" Matt repeated. Again. He rolled up the half-eaten bar in the wrapper and fumbled it into his pocket. "You have a little..." He gently stroked a finger along her plump cheek, wiping it clean of the ice-cream there.

"Thank you," Mindy repeated, smirking. "Well, let's not keep Wanda and Rose waiting."

Matt nodded as he opened the door for her, admiring her enormous physique before he followed her out. The air outside was as crisp and refreshing as ever, filling their lungs and invigorating them further for the days ahead. He could see the first coaches in the distance; it would be a while yet before the campers arrived. He found himself glancing again at Mindy as he kept an easy pace with her, before he turned to look forward, a warmth running up his neck. He could only hope that she did not notice.

All at once, his stomach starts to rumble.

"I heard that!" said Mindy back over one shoulder. "I like a guy with a good appetite...
